explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'PrimaryScan%' END

statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE ANY v IN a1 SATISFIES v IS NOT VALUED END AND test_id = "parameters"

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'PrimaryScan%' END

statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE ANY AND EVERY v IN a1 SATISFIES v IS NOT VALUED END AND test_id = "parameters"

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Order' AND CONTAINS(v.`sort_terms`[0].`expr`, "_index_key") END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c2 = 311 OR c4 = 221) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

testcase: MB-55236, part 2, different OR subterm ordering, early order

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Order' AND CONTAINS(v.`sort_terms`[0].`expr`, "_index_key") END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c4 = 221 OR c2 = 311) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

testcase: MB-55236, part 3, no limit, no early order, union scan

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'UnionScan' END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c4 = 221 OR c2 = 311) ORDER BY c6

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE EVERY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES (v.`#operator` IS MISSING OR v.`#operator` != 'IntersectScan') END

statements: SELECT * FROM shellTest WHERE c1 = 1 AND c2 = 10

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix2' AND v.`index_keys` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans[0].`range`) = 3 AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans[1].`range`) = 2 END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((15 BETWEEN c2 AND c4) OR (c2 BETWEEN 200 AND 300)) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix1' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND v.`index_group_aggs` IS MISSING END

statements: SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((c2 = 11 AND IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") != "") OR (IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") == ""))

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix2' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND v.`index_group_aggs` IS MISSING END

statements: SELECT count(c6) AS cnt FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((c2 = 11 AND IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") != "") OR (IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") == ""))

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix2' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND v.`limit` IS NOT MISSING END

statements: SELECT c1, c2, c4, c6 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((c2 = 211 AND c4 = 221) OR (c2 = 511 AND c4 = 521)) LIMIT 2

testcase: MB-58157 Part 1, non-covering parent query, non-covering subquery

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY u WITHIN p.`~subqueries` SATISFIES u.`correlated` = true AND ANY v WITHIN u.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Fetch' AND v.`cache_result` = true END END

statements: SELECT d.c2, (SELECT d1.c2 FROM orders d1 WHERE d1.c2 = d.c2) AS sub FROM orders d WHERE d.c2 < 400 AND d.test_id = 'idxfltr' ORDER BY d.c2

testcase: MB-58157 Part 2, covering parent query, non-covering subquery

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY u WITHIN p.`~subqueries` SATISFIES u.`correlated` = true AND ANY v WITHIN u.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Fetch' AND v.`cache_result` = true END AND CONTAINS(u.`subquery`, 'cover ((`d`.`c2`))') END

statements: SELECT d.c2, (SELECT d1.c2 FROM orders d1 WHERE d1.c2 = d.c2) AS sub FROM orders d WHERE d.c1 = 1 AND d.c2 < 400 AND d.test_id = 'idxfltr' ORDER BY d.c2

testcase: MB-58157 Part 3, covering parent query, covering subquery

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY u WITHIN p.`~subqueries` SATISFIES u.`correlated` = true AND ANY v WITHIN u.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`cache_result` = true AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING END AND CONTAINS(u.`subquery`, 'cover ((meta(`d`).`id`))') END

statements: SELECT d.c2, (SELECT meta(d1).id FROM orders d1 WHERE CONCAT(meta(d1).id, '1') = CONCAT(meta(d).id, '1')) AS sub FROM orders d WHERE d.c1 = 1 AND d.c2 < 400 AND d.test_id = 'idxfltr' ORDER BY d.c2

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`index_projection`.`entry_keys`) = 2 END

statements: SELECT c FROM orders d UNNEST attr.colors AS c LET da = d.attr WHERE da.id = 1 AND da.colors IS NOT MISSING AND d.test_id = "indexbugs"

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ishix4' END

statements: SELECT 1 FROM shellTest WHERE c5 = 10 AND c8 >= 11 AND c8 <= 20 AND c6 != 1 AND c7 NOT IN [1,2] AND c11 != 0

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.`plan` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ishix4' AND v.`limit` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`offset` IS NOT MISSING END

statements: SELECT c8, c10 FROM shellTest WHERE c5 = 10 AND c6 != 1 AND c7 NOT IN [1,2] AND c11 != 0 OFFSET 10 LIMIT 5
